Title: Candyman: Day of the Dead
Writer: Clive Barker (based upon characters created by), Alfredo Septién, Turi Meyer
Actors: Tony Todd, Donna D'Errico, Jsu Garcia, Wade Williams
Plot: The Candyman returns to try to convince his female descendent, an artist, to join him as a legendary figure. To this end, he frames her for a series of hideous murders of her friends and associates so that she has nowhere else to turn to.
